resources.string: Open Source developers turn love and money from their community into honest, quality software. Buy us a beer or contribute code to this project!

%s submit articles I share to Glance from external applications (e.g: my browser) to the Recent and Popular Feeds, which are visible to all users. Only the article URL and page Title is transmitted. No identifying information is transmitted.

Glance is a speed reader for web pages and .epub books. 

Sharing 

If you'd like to anonymously submit articles you read for inclusion in the Popular and Recent Feeds check out the Settings menu (Gear icon in the Action Bar). 

Integrates with your Browser 

You can share URLs to Glance from your favorite browser's Share menu. 

Epub book support 

Touch the book icon in the Action Bar to open an e-book in the Epub format (.epub).
Submit this article for inclusion in the Recent and Popular feeds? If you liked it, let other Glancers know!
